name: Subacute Thyroiditis
chief_complaint: I've had a sore throat and neck pain for a few weeks, and I feel feverish and tired all the time
prognosis: Generally excellent with complete recovery in 2-4 months, though may transiently pass through hypothyroid phase
description: Post-viral inflammatory thyroid condition causing thyroid follicle destruction and transient thyrotoxicosis followed by recovery phase. Often follows URI. Three phases: thyrotoxic (2-6 weeks), hypothyroid (weeks-months), and recovery.
